name: Grandmother (Jordan Magnuson)
description:
A tiny interactive sketch about the mundane things of life which are also sacred; inspired by being in Vietnam during Tết. Takes about three minutes to play through, and requires no gaming skills. Made for my GameTrekking project in 2011.

This game was ported to GameMaker/HTML5 in 2022 by myself, Jeffry Robbins, and Matthew Ismay.

Source code on GitHub
